reviews.review: отличная игра
Pretty Fantastic

Es casi imposible describir bien lo increible que resulta este juego. Si te gustan los juegos por sus historias esto es para vos. El juego es de 1998 y todavía me resulta sorprendente la jugabilidad que poseé, la necesidad de razonar problemas que se presentan y como pone a prueba tu capacidad para resolverlos sin darte ni una sola pista.  Todavía me asombra como va matizando la historia y como se desarrolla. Es casi como ser el personaje principal de una película.

Muy recomendable.
Is a good game (Crack-Life)

Que decir de este juego,uno de los padres de los shooters modernos,si te gustan los videojuegos deberías jugarlo al menos una vez en tu vida.Un juego casi perfecto para mi,salvo por el puto resbalamiento de Freeman,que hace que algunas zonas sean algo frustrantes y difíciles.
Играется очень бодро и в 2019 году. Шедевр на все времена!
Не забудте про мульти плеер.Он классный.

This is a game that started Valve and the Half-Life franchise (or lack thereof, since 3 will never happen) and honestly, for a 1998 first person shooter game it's very impressive. Unlike other shooter games before it, it told a story with dialogue in integrated cutscenes, and without walls of texts in between stand-alone levels. The game just kind of flows from start to finish seamlessly. I can definitely appreciate it for what it is.

You follow the story of research assistant/guinea pig Gordon Freeman, as his employer's top secret research facility unintentionally opens up a portal to another dimension, aliens invade, and the government sends in black ops to kill all witnesses and clean up. Everyone but your coworkers are out to get you and you need to help each other to stay alive and figure out what the hell is happening. Pretty cool, I got a lot of HP Lovecraft and John Carpenter's The Thing vibes from this one, and the early game feels almost a little survival horror-y.

This game has a lot of problems though, that I feel people may unfairly give this game a pass on that they wouldn't let slide with other games, even other older ones. Now, I played on hard mode, full disclosure (as a rule of thumb, if there are 3 or fewer difficulties, I choose the hardest one, and if there are 4 or more, I choose the second highest. It usually keeps games challenging and also keeping the BS factor down), so this may have affected my experience, although rarely was my problem "there isn't enough health or ammo!", and only with the black mesa paramilitary ops did they seem to take like 4000 bullets, so I don't think that's the case.

This game relies HEAVILY on platforming sections, which this game is a prime example of why platforming is GOD AWFUL in the first person and DOES NOT WORK 99% of the time. It's just to difficult to gauge where you are, build and lose momentum, you clip on things you don't mean, a SLIGHT change in elevation in your running start will insta-kill you when you lose all your momentum and miss your mark, the list goes on. This game I had to save scum at every jump. It just got worse and worse as it went on, with the final areas and final boss being unbearable. 

The other mortal FPS sin this game commits is enemies spawning immediately in front of you or right behind you. This is just complete BS and no game should get away with it. It adds to the save scumming when I'm short on HP and die simply cause Gaben thought it'd be funny to throw a lightning casting alien that deals a fifth of a full health bar of damage right behind me as I'm walking through a hallway I just cleared. There's fair challenge, then there's the designer just being an a*shole. 

The third mortal FPS sin this game commits is sections where you must take mandatory damage to proceed. This builds off the previous point of enemies getting in cheap shots and adding to the necessity of save scumming, as there are certain areas where, for example, the vent gives in and you fall to the ground and take maybe 20 or 30 damage. Okay, sure, but what if I just saved a moment before, and only have 20-30 HP? You're f*cked. You have to reload an auto save from 20 minutes ago and get through a few action segments taking minimal damage. It's also BS.

By the time I was wrapping up with this game, I was just done. If the good aspects of this game were a little better, or if there were fewer problems, I'd have given this an upvote. The price is insane, though, in the game's favor (they practically give this game away on sale, it's like $0.40-$0.80). Honestly, I'd only recommend this game if you've already played Doom 1&2, Duke Nukem 3D, Turok, and Quake 1&2. I preferred all of those games over this one, and honestly, if you're new to the classic FPS scene and HAVE NOT played those games, do yourself a favor and play those first. They're less aggravating, even though they also all have their fair share of the good ol' 90's BS.

But, even if you have already played all those, play this one on normal mode. The game is more about the adventure, atmosphere, and action set pieces anyway, and not so much on the gunplay or challenge.

EDIT: Also, Gordon throws like a b*tch. A toddler can throw a wiffleball with more distance and intensity than Gordon can throw a 'nade. I know he's got a PhD, but he still needs to hit the gym.

I can see why people rate this so highly after playing it.  Great atmosphere and gunplay, however some of the platforming and the later alien levels leave a lot to be desired.

Other than that, I'd certainly recommend this.

Перлина світової ігрової індустрії та один з найкращих класичних шутерів цінність та високу якість якого більшість сучасних геймерів на жаль не зрозуміє. Цікавий сюжет, головоломки, купа зброї з різним напрямом та різним стилем гри, якісний геймдизайн - все це є чудовим прикладом для того, як потрібно робити справжні ігри.
难以想象，这居然是98年的游戏，现在看起来还能接受的画质，先进的游戏理念和丰富的npc，真是太不可思议了，最重要的是只要1元。08年以前我还只玩过红白机。
BEST GAME FOREVER

Half Life was a great game back in 1998. Today, not so much.

It's quite technically impressive for its time, but the 90s shooter mechanics have not aged well at all. Clunky forced platforming, aimbot enemies that can turn on a dime, sparse ammo, and impossible situations forcing you to go to a much older save if you don't happen to have enough health or the correct ammo in certain spot to name a few pain points.

I can recommend this to a FPS fan who wants to play a piece of gaming history and see where Valve got started, otherwise save yourself the frustration and go play something else.

2005 yılında daha 6 yaşında bu oyun ile tanıştım. O zamanlar tabii oyun bilgim önüme gelen herkesi öldüreyim boş boş zevk alayım. O oyunun en başındaki sahnede etrafı boş boş gezerken söylediğim " ne kadar sıkıcı bir oyun ya " cümlesi hala aklımda. Kim bilir ki ilk başlarda sıkıcı dediğim oyun , oyunculuk hayatımın başlamasında en büyük katkı sağlayacak. Günümüzde CoD ve Battlefield gibi neredeyse sadece online için çıkan oyunların yapamadığı bir çok şeyi adamlar bundan 21 yıl önce yapmıştı. Önünde şapka çıkarılıp ayakta alkışlanacak bir baş yapıt. 21 yaşına girecek olan bu oyun günümüzde bile oyuncuya zevk aldıracak kadar güzelse tartışmaya gerek yok. 

Ayrı olarak Crossfire haritasında o inatla nükleer kuran arkadaşlarımıza tekrardan selam olsun.

[b]Pograłem troszkę i muszę przyznać, że klimat to ta gra ma kosmicznie, mocarnie, potężnie, cholernie dobry naprawdę za sam klimat dałbym 10/10 oraz za samo otoczenie, również 10/10 mimo lat i grafiki ja czuje, że ten świat nie jest taki płaski i nudny tylko ci ludzie żyją oraz to otoczenie, również nie jest martwe ono mocno przyciąga uwagę no coś pięknego :D

Niestety nigdy nie byłem fanem prostych strzelanek, a szczególnie gier, w których mamy lekkie odczucie, że nie jest to zwykły fps, a dodatkowo lekki bo lekki, ale dalej horror.[/b]

[h1][b]Strzelanie z karabinu to czysta karuzela przyjemności![/b][/h1]

[b]Horrory uwielbiam oglądać, lecz jeśli mam w nie grać to już nie jestem taki pewny siebie..

Na pewno gry nie ocenię, ponieważ po wcześniej wymienionych czynnikach czuje, że gdybym lubił gry tego typu to bym się bawił po prostu świetnie i nie chce dawać oceny ani za wysokiej ani zdecydowanie za niskiej.[/b]

Ich habe das Spiel in einem Sale bekommen und muss einen großen Lob aussprechen, da das Spiel selbst in 2019 noch für mehrere Stunden Spielspaß gesorgt hat. Nur in manchen Teilen des Spieles und in der Graphik ist das Alter anzusehen. Zudem kommt, dass die Steuerung und die Tastenkombinationen gewöhnungsbedürftig sind besonders, da es noch in den Anfangsjahren des shooter sind. Ein Kauf wert, wenn man es für einen oder zwei Euro bekommt.

在游戏里初期真的好无助，枪里子弹不够，就只能带着卫兵跑路，一路上卫兵解决问题，直到卫兵不能跟着我一起走的时候我再用撬棍把卫兵敲死，抢他的子弹，只为了自己接下来玩的过程中轻松一点，自己活的久一点。
想不到21年前的游戏把人性试出来了
刚下缆车就跳出。再进又跳出。这个游戏也太不稳定了。我是steam上买的正版游戏啊。
